00225 inline int KviConsole::selectedCount()
00226 {
00227         return m_pNotifyListView->selectedCount();
00228 }
00229 
00230 inline bool KviConsole::isIPv6Connection()
00231 {
00232         __range_valid(connection());
00233         return connection()->target()->server()->isIPv6();
00234 }
00235 
00236 inline bool KviConsole::isNotConnected()
00237 {
00238         return (context()->state() == KviIrcContext::Idle);
00239 }
00240 
00241 inline QString KviConsole::currentNetworkName()
00242 {
00243         return (connection() ? connection()->networkName() : QString());
00244 }
